The Athletic just got better. We’re introducing a premiere audio experience for subscribers featuring more than 20 exclusive podcasts hosted by some of The Athletic’s world-class writing team and audio talent. Go deeper on The Athletic’s storytelling and hear our stories told in a whole new way.

• Podcast tracks!
• Gift The Athletic!
• Added Up Next feature for podcasts
• We've tidied up for the holidays, our app is now 25% smaller!

• Article Background Color now defaults to your System Appearance color. If you choose a separate background color it will now remain locked on that color for every article until you change it.

- Brand new menu for seeing your league/team/author feed
- Added support for Google, Apple login/signup.
- Redesigned podcast tab
- Redesigned scores tab
- Redesigned community tab
- A bunch of under the hood improvements
- App startup time is now 50% faster

Introducing more ways to catch up, go deep, and join the conversation on the sports stories that matter:
- Front Page tab highlighting the most important stories in sports.
- Real Time tab delivering expert commentary from the newsroom.
- Q&As and discussions in your personalized feed.
- Podcasts and saved stories accessible from your profile.

Introducing more ways to catch up, go deep, and join the conversation on the sports stories that matter:
- Front Page tab highlighting the most important stories in sports.
- Real Time tab delivering expert commentary from the newsroom.
- Q&As and discussions in your personalized feed.
- Podcasts and saved stories accessible from your profile.

Introducing more ways to catch up, go deep, and join the conversation on the sports stories that matter:
- Front Page tab highlighting the most important stories in sports.
- Real Time tab delivering expert commentary from the newsroom.
- Q&As and discussions in your personalized feed.
- Podcasts and saved stories accessible from your profile.
- iOS 14 Headlines Widget

Bug fixes:
- Podcast mini player will no longer disappear

-Newsroom insights in real time
